# Results
\

The *Result Summary Table* below, constructed using the following [code snippet](https://github.com/AzKurban-edX-DS/Capstone-MovieLens/blob/main/r/src/capstone-movielens.main.R#L2368), shows in detail the progress of our *Recommender System* improvement:

```{r main-script@l2368, eval=FALSE}
total.RMSEs.ResultTibble <- RMSEs.AddDiffColumn(final.MF.RMSEs.ResultTibble)
```{r}
RMSE.Total_kable(total.RMSEs.ResultTibble)
```

::: {.noteblock data-latex=""}
In the code snippet above, we use the [RMSEs.AddDiffColumn](#func.RMSEs.AddDiffColumn) and [RMSE.Total_kable](#func.RMSE.Total_kable) functions described in section [Result RMSEs Tibble Functions] of [Appendix A](#appndx_a).
:::
